translation: I am the same to all beings; there is none hateful or dear to Me; but those who worship Me with devotion are in Me, and I am also in them.
commentary: 9.29 equal the same? I'm I? in all beings in all beings? Not not? Me to Me? hateful hateful? Is there is? Not not? Dear: dear? These who? worship worship? You but? Maam Me? bhaktya with devotion? Mayi in Me? And they? in them in them? f and? Even also? I am I.Commentary The Lord has an even outlook towards all. He regards all living beings alike. None Have you condemned? none has He favoured. He is the enemy of none. Hey
